text: Measures agreed so far include: 1. A mass call-out of police, special constables and reserves, with 750 policemen posted from outlying districts to stations in the area West End Central, Bow-street, and Cannon-row.
handwritten_text: Measures agreed so far include: 1. A mass call-out of police, special constables and reserves, with 750 policemen posted from outlying districts to stations in the area West End Central, Bow-street, and Cannon-row.
